.

member.summary: Updates data that already exists in euGrid and appends new data to euGrid using SQLConnection for data loading defined in euGrid initialization. Query for new data selection will be "select * from table_scheme.table_name"

member.summary: Updates data in euGrid using SQLConnection for data loading defined in euGrid initialization.

member.summary: Updates data that already exists in euGrid and appends new data to euGrid using SQLConnection for data loading defined in euGrid initialization.

member.name: M:AGV.euGridView.RefreshDataInEuGrid(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refresh data in euGrid. Could be applied when euGrid is initialized with table_scheme.table_name attributes. Query for data selection will be "select * from table_scheme.table_name"
member.param: if true - data in euGrid will be updated + new data will be appended to the end of the data in euGrid. false - data in euGrid will be updated only

member.name: M:AGV.euGridView.UpdateData(AGD.Candies.SmartCollection{System.Object})
member.summary: Updates data in euGrid from new SmartCollection as Source

member.summary: Refresh data in euGrid. Uses SmartCollection as Source
member.param: if true - data in euGrid will be updated + new data will be appended to the end of the data in euGrid. false - data in euGrid will be updated only

member.summary: Refresh data in euGrid. Uses sql string to aquire new data and Primary Key from euGridSettings or table_scheme.table_name, depends on euGrid Initialization way.
member.param: if true - data in euGrid will be updated + new data will be appended to the end of the data in euGrid. false - data in euGrid will be updated only

member.summary: Creates an instance of window for tasks execution. AutoCloseMode is mandatory

member.summary: Calls ShowDialog and immideately launches process of scheduled tasks execution in according to their waves.

member.summary: Please use Execute() method instead of ShowDialog. This method will throw an exception.

member.name: M:AGV.Windows.wnd_Progress.Show
member.summary: Please use Execute() method instead of ShowDialog. This method will throw an exception.

member.name: M:AGV.Windows.wnd_Progress._Close
member.summary: forces window to be closed. Does not perform any terminate actions for scheduled tasks.

member.name: M:AGV.Windows.wnd_Progress._AddTask(System.String,AGD.Simple.ObjectDelegate,System.Object,System.Byte)
member.summary: Schedules task execution.
member.param: Tasks can be grouped in waves for parallel launch. Next wave will be executed after all tasks on previous wave have finished their execution.

member.name: M:AGV.Windows.wnd_Progress._AddTask(System.String,AGV.SimpleDelegate,System.Byte)
member.summary: Schedules task execution.
member.param: Tasks can be grouped in waves for parallel launch. Next wave will be executed after all tasks on previous wave have finished their execution.

member.name: M:AGV.Windows.wnd_Progress._AddParallelizedTask(System.String,AGD.Simple.ObjectDelegate,System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.Int32,System.Threading.ThreadPriority,System.Byte)
member.summary: Schedules parallelized task execution. This type of task is usefull for big collection processing as it manages additional threads and autosplit of huge collection to some number of chanks.
member.param: Function to be executed on automatically extracted subset of collection
Collection to be splitted into chanks and passed to multiple threads, that will execute function passed in p_del
Number of threads per logical processor
Tasks can be grouped in waves for parallel launch. Next wave will be executed after all tasks on previous wave have finished their execution.
